statements: SELECT * FROM WaterAndSanitation
SELECT water_source, water_usage FROM WaterAndSanitation WHERE water_usage > 50
SELECT sanitation_practices FROM WaterAndSanitation WHERE region_id = 2
SELECT region_id, water_usage, water_source FROM WaterAndSanitation ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regions FROM WaterAndSanitation
SELECT * FROM WaterAndSanitation ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT water_source, water_usage FROM WaterAndSanitation WHERE water_usage > 50;
SELECT * FROM WaterAndSanitation WHERE sanitation_practices LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT region_id, water_source, sanitation_practices FROM WaterAndSanitation WHERE water_source = 'River';
SELECT MAX(water_usage) AS max_water_usage, MIN(water_usage) AS min_water_usage FROM WaterAndSanitation;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE UsageType = 'Residential'
SELECT ID, Area, UsageAmount, RecordedAt FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY RecordedAt DESC
SELECT Area, UsageType, RecordedAt FROM WaterUsage WHERE UsageAmount > 100 ORDER BY Area ASC
SELECT PracticeType, PracticeDetail FROM SanitationPractices WHERE RecordedAt > '2022-01-01'
SELECT ID, Area FROM SanitationPractices ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID, Area, UsageType, UsageAmount, RecordedAt FROM WaterUsage WHERE UsageAmount > 100 ORDER BY RecordedAt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE Area = 'Kitchen' OR Area = 'Bathroom' ORDER BY UsageAmount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT Area, SUM(UsageAmount) as TotalUsage FROM WaterUsage WHERE RecordedAt >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY Area ORDER BY TotalUsage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT Area, PracticeType FROM WaterUsage JOIN SanitationPractices ON WaterUsage.Area = SanitationPractices.Area ORDER BY Area, RecordedAt DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT Area, MAX(UsageAmount) as MaxUsage FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY Area ORDER BY MaxUsage DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT household_id, water_consumption FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_consumption > 100 ORDER BY water_consumption ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT household_id, water_source FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_source LIKE '%well%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SanitationPractices WHERE toilet_facilities = TRUE AND hygiene_practices = 'Good';
SELECT household_id, impact_description FROM HealthImpact WHERE water_related_illness = TRUE OR sanitation_related_illness = TRUE ORDER BY household_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, household_id, water_consumption, water_source, date_time FROM WaterUsage WHERE water_consumption > 100 ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SanitationPractices WHERE waste_disposal = 'Composting' AND toilet_facilities = TRUE ORDER BY date_time ASC;

SELECT w.id, s.hygiene_practices, h.water_related_illness FROM WaterUsage w JOIN SanitationPractices s ON w.household_id = s.household_id JOIN HealthImpact h ON w.household_id = h.household_id WHERE h.water_related_illness = TRUE ORDER BY w.id;
SELECT s.id, s.household_id, s.date_time, h.impact_description FROM SanitationPractices s LEFT JOIN HealthImpact h ON s.household_id = h.household_id WHERE s.date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.id;

SELECT w.id, w.water_consumption, s.toilet_facilities, h.sanitation_related_illness, h.impact_description FROM WaterUsage w INNER JOIN SanitationPractices s ON w.household_id = s.household_id LEFT JOIN HealthImpact h ON w.household_id = h.household_id WHERE w.water_consumption < 50 AND s.toilet_facilities = FALSE AND h.sanitation_related_illness = TRUE ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage;
SELECT user_id, water_usage_volume FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, practice_description FROM SanitationPractices WHERE practice_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, health_condition FROM HealthStatistics WHERE health_condition LIKE '%healthy%';
SELECT user_id, resident_name, resident_address FROM UrbanSlumResidents ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT resident_name, resident_address FROM UrbanSlumResidents WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT health_condition AS condition, health_date FROM HealthStatistics ORDER BY health_date DESC;
SELECT practice_description, practice_date FROM SanitationPractices WHERE practice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(water_usage_volume) AS total_usage FROM WaterUsage GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageTrends;
SELECT id, location, water_source FROM WaterUsageTrends ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT usage_amount, location, water_source FROM WaterUsageTrends WHERE usage_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM HealthIndicators WHERE value < 50;
SELECT location, survey_date, responder_name FROM SurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageTrends WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, water_source FROM WaterUsageTrends WHERE location = 'City A' AND water_source = 'River' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT value, indicator_name FROM HealthIndicators WHERE value < 0.5 ORDER BY location ASC, indicator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyData WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC, survey_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM Interventions WHERE location = 'Village B' AND intervention_type = 'Education' ORDER BY id DESC;
